hits.name: gThumb Image Viewer
hits.description:
gThumb is an image viewer, editor, browser and organizer.  It is designed
      to be well integrated with the GNOME 3 desktop.
    
      
      As an image viewer gThumb allows to view common image file formats
      such as BMP, JPEG, GIF (including the animations), PNG, TIFF, TGA and
      RAW images.
      It is also possible to view various metadata types embedded inside an
      image such as EXIF, IPTC and XMP.
    
      
      As an image editor gThumb allows to scale, rotate and crop the images;
      change the saturation, lightness, contrast as well as other color
      transformations.
    
      
      As an image browser gThumb shows the thumbnails of the images saved on
      your disk, allows to perform the common operations of a file manager such
      as copy, move and delete files and folders.
      Furthermore there is a series of image specific tools such as JPEG
      lossless transformations; image resize; format conversion; slideshow;
      setting an image as desktop background and several others.
    
      
      As an image organizer gThumb allows to add comments and other metadata to
      images; organize images in catalogs and catalogs in libraries; search
      for images and save the result as a catalog.

TambÃ© Ã©s possible visualitzar alguns tipus de metadades incrustades dins d'una imatge com ara EXIF, IPTC i XMP.
      Com a editor d'imatges, gThumb permet escalar, girar i retallar les imatges; canviar la saturaciÃ³, la lluminositat, el contrast, aixÃ­ com altres transformacions de color.
      Com a navegador d'imatges, gThumb mostra les miniatures de les imatges desades al vostre disc, permet realitzar les operacions mÃ©s comunes d'un gestor de fitxers tals com copiar, moure i suprimir fitxers i carpetes. A mÃ©s hi ha una sÃ¨rie d'eines especÃ­fiques d'imatges, com ara les transformacions sense pÃ¨rdua JPEG; redimensiÃ³ d'imatge; conversiÃ³ de format; presentaciÃ³ de diapositives; establiment d'una imatge com a fons d'escriptori i algunes altres mÃ©s.
      Com a organitzador d'imatges, gThumb us permet afegir comentaris i altres metadades a les imatges; organitzar les imatges en catÃ legs i els catÃ legs en biblioteques; buscar imatges i desar el resultat com un catÃ leg.

id.description:
gThumb adalah penampil, penyunting, peramban, dan pengorganisasi gambar. Ini dirancang untuk terintegrasi baik dengan desktop GNOME 3.
      Sebagai penampil gambar gThumb bisa menampilkan format berkas gambar umum seperti BMP, JPEG, GIF (termasuk animasi), PNG, TIFF, TGA, dan RAW. Juga mungkin melihat berbagai tipe metadata yang tertanam dalam suatu gambar seperti EXIF, IPTC, dan XMP.
      Sebagai penyunting gambar gThumb bisa menskala, memutar, dan memotong gambar; mengubah saturasi, kecerahan, kontras, maupun transformasi warna lain.
      Sebagai peramban gambar gThumb menampilkan gambar mini dari citra yang disimpan pada disk Anda, bisa melakukan operasi umum dari manajer berkas seperti menyalin, memindah, dan menghapus berkas serta folder. Lebih lanjut ada sederet alat spesifik citra seperti transformasi JPEG lossless; ubah ukuran gambar; konversi format; pertunjukan salindia; menata gambar sebagai latar belakang desktop, dan beberapa lainnya.
      Sebagai pengorganisasi gambar gThumb bisa menambah komentar dan metadata lain ke citra; mengorganisasi citra dalam katalog dan katalog dalam pustaka; mencari citra dan menyimpan hasilnya sebagai katalog.
id.name: gThumb Penampil Gambar

it.description:
gThumb Ã¨ un visualizzatore di immagini, editor, esploratore e organizzatore. Ãˆ progettato per essere ben integrato con il desktop GNOME 3.
      Come visualizzatore di immagini gThumb consente di visualizzare i comuni formati di file di immagine come BMP, JPEG, GIF (incluse le animazioni), PNG TIFF, TGA e immagini RAW. Ãˆ possibile visualizzare anche vari tipi di metadati incorporati nell'immagine come EXIF, IPTC e XMP.
      Come editor di immagini gThumb consente di scalare, ruotare e ritagliare le immagini; modificare la saturazione, la luminositÃ , il contrasto e anche altre trasformazioni di colori.
      Come esploratore di immagini gThumb mostra le miniature delle immagini salvate sul disco, consente le operazioni comuni di un gestore di file come copiare, spostare ed eliminare file e cartelle. Inoltre, ci sono una serie di strumenti specifici per le immagini come le trasformazioni senza perdita di JPEG; ridimensionamento immagine; conversione formato; diapositive; impostare un'immagine come sfondo della scrivania e molti altri.
      Come organizzatore di immagini gThumb consente di aggiungere commenti e altri metadati nelle immagini; organizzare le immagini in cataloghi e cataloghi in raccolte; cercare le immagini e salvare il risultato come catalogo.
it.name: Visualizzatore immagini gThumb
it.summary: Visualizza e organizza le proprie immagini

nl.description:
gThumb is een afbeeldingenviewer, bewerker, verkenner en organisator in Ã©Ã©n. Het is ontworpen voor een goede integratie met de GNOME 3-omgeving.
      Als afbeeldingenviewer leest gThumb gangbare formaten zoals bijvoorbeeld BMP, JPEG, GIF (inclusief animaties), PNG, TIFF, TGA en RAW. Het is ook mogelijk om de ingebedde metadata van een afbeelding weer te geven, zoals Exif, IPTC en XMP.
      Als beeldbewerker kan gThumb afbeeldingen schalen, roteren en bijsnijden, de verzadiging en helderheid en het contrast aanpassen, of de kleurniveaus wijzigen.
      Als afbeeldingenverkenner toont gThumb miniaturen van de afbeeldingen op uw computer en biedt het de algemene functies van een bestandsbeheerder zoals kopiÃ«ren, verplaatsen of verwijderen van bestanden en mappen. Daarnaast zijn er specifieke gereedschappen aanwezig zoals verliesloze JPEG-compressie, formaatconversie, diavoorstellingen, afbeelding instellen als bureaubladachtergrond, en meer.
      Als afbeeldingenorganisator kunt u met gThumb commentaren en andere metadata aan uw afbeeldingen toevoegen, beelden in catalogi organiseren en catalogi in bibliotheken, alsmede afbeeldingen zoeken en de resultaten als een catalogus bewaren.
nl.name: gThumb-afbeeldingsweergave

hits.name: Fractal
hits.description:
Fractal is a Matrix messaging app for GNOME written in Rust. Its interface is optimized for
      collaboration in large groups, such as free software projects, and will fit all screens, big or small.
    
      Highlights:
      
        Find rooms to discuss your favorite topics, or talk privately to people, securely thanks to end-to-end encryption
        Send rich formatted messages, files, or your current location
        Reply to specific messages, react with emoji, mention users or rooms, edit or remove messages
        View images, and play audio and video directly in the conversation
        See who has read messages, and who is typing
        Log into multiple accounts at once (with Single-Sign On support)

id.description:
Fractal adalah aplikasi perpesanan Matrix untuk GNOME yang ditulis dalam Rust. Antarmukanya dioptimalkan untuk kolaborasi dalam grup besar, seperti proyek perangkat lunak bebas, dan akan pas semua layar, besar atau kecil.
      
        Temukan ruang untuk mendiskusikan topik favorit Anda, atau berbicara secara pribadi dengan orang-orang, dengan aman berkat enkripsi ujung ke ujung
        Mengirim pesan yang kaya format, berkas, atau lokasi Anda saat ini
        Membalas pesan tertentu, berreaksi dengan emoji, menyebut pengguna atau ruang, menyunting atau menghapus pesan
        Melihat gambar, dan memutar audio dan video langsung dalam percakapan
        Melihat siapa yang telah membaca pesan, dan siapa yang sedang mengetik
        Masuk ke beberapa akun sekaligus (dengan dukungan Single Sign On)
id.name: Fractal

hits.name: Collision
hits.description:
Verifying that a file you downloaded or received is actually the one you were
      expecting is often overlooked or too time-consuming to do. At the same time, it
      has become very easy to get your hands on a file that has been tampered with, due
      to the mass increase of malicious webpages and other actors.
    
      
      This tool aims to solve that. Collision comes with a simple & clean UI, allowing
      anyone, from any age and experience group, to generate, compare and verify MD5,
      SHA-256, SHA-512, SHA-1, Blake3, CRC32 and Adler32 hashes.

hits.name: Stimulator
hits.description:
Prevents the desktop environment (DE) from sleeping.
      It should work regardless of the used DE thanks to the Inhibit portal.
    
      Features:
      
        Overrides system setting and disables automatic suspending
        Overrides system setting and disables screen blanking and screen locking
        Option to use system default, light or dark theme
        AppIndicator support

hits.name: Turn On
hits.summary: Turn on devices in your network
hits.description:
Conveniently turn on devices in your network, such as a NAS or a gaming console,
            using Wake On LAN (WoL).
      Features:
      
        Add devices to turn on.
        Turn on devices with magic Wake On LAN (WoL) packets.
        Monitor device status.

de.description:
Bequem GerÃ¤te in Deinem Netzwerk, wie ein NAS oder eine Spielekonsole, per Wake-On-LAN (WoL) anschalten.
      FunktionalitÃ¤t:
      
        GerÃ¤te zum Anschalten hinzufÃ¼gen.
        GerÃ¤te mittels Wake-On-LAN Paket anschalten.
        GerÃ¤testatus anzeigen.
de.name: Anschalten

it.description:
Accendi comodamente i dispositivi nella tua rete, come un NAS o una console di gioco, utilizzando Wake On LAN (WoL).
      Caratteristiche:
      
        Aggiungi dispositivi da accendere.
        Attiva i dispositivi con i pacchetti magici Wake On LAN (WoL).
        Monitoraggio dello stato del dispositivo.
it.name: Turn On
it.summary: Accendi i dispositivi nella tua rete

hits.name: Xpano
hits.description:
Xpano is a photo stitching tool that focuses on simplicity and ease of use, you can use it to:
    
      
        Auto detect groups of images that can be stitched into panoramas
        Quickly preview the results with zoom and pan
        Crop, auto fill boundaries and select from multiple projection types
        Adjust the projection parameters: pitch, yaw and roll
        Export full resolution panoramas, including exif metadata

hits.name: Exercise Timer
hits.summary: Train and rest with high intensity
hits.description:
Exercise timer is a simple utility to conduct interval training.
      Following a short preparation period, a prescribed number of exercise sets are played. In between each exercise, there is a resting period.
      The app does not make an assumption about the kind of the exercise.
      Features:
      
        Save and recall presets containing the number of sets and the duration of the exercise, rest and preparation periods.
        A beeping sound is played at- and prior to each transition.
        The volume of the sound can be adjusted.
        Light and dark mode follows the system's setting.

hits.name: Kodi
hits.description:
Kodi allows users to play and view videos, music, podcasts,
        and other digital media files from local storage, network storage
        and the internet. It's optimized for a 10-foot user interface to be
        used with televisions and remote controls.
      Kodi spawned from the love of media. It is an entertainment hub
        that brings all your digital media together into a beautiful
        and user friendly package. It is 100% free and open source,
        very customisable and runs on a wide variety of devices. It is
        supported by a dedicated team of volunteers and a huge community.

hits.description:
A photo gallery for everyone who wants their photos to live locally on their devices.
      Why enjoy your photo library with Fotema?
      
        View iOS Live Photos and Android motion photos (Samsung devices only).
        View photos plotted on a map.
        Automatically detects faces.
        View your library by year or month.
        Play videos.
        Many supported image formats. Fotema supports the same image formats as Loupe (the GNOME image viewer).

hits.name: Clapper
hits.description:
Clapper is a modern media player designed for simplicity and ease of use.
      Powered by GStreamer and built for the GNOME desktop environment using
      GTK4 toolkit, it has a clean and stylish interface that lets you focus
      on enjoying your favorite videos.
    
      
      Clapper uses a playback queue where you can add multiple media files.
      Think of it like a playlist that you can build. You can easily reorder
      items or remove them from the queue with a simple drag and drop operation.

hits.name: Trayscale
hits.description:
Trayscale is an unofficial GUI interface for the Tailscale daemon particularly for use on Linux, as no official Linux GUI client exists. It provides a basic system tray icon and a fairly comprehensive UI with support for many of Tailscale's features.
		
      
			Trayscale interfaces with the Tailscale daemon, tailscaled, to perform many of its operations. In order for this to work, the daemon must have been configured with the current user as the "operator". To do this, run sudo tailscale set --operator=$USER from the command-line at least once manually.

hits.name: Syndic
hits.description:
Syndic is a simple, touch-friendly feed reader for KDE Plasma Desktop. Subscribe to any site that provides an RSS or Atom feed. Get automatically-generated 
            highlights from your collection, search for articles by keyword, or page through a list of every new article.
      Features include:
      
        Adaptive design - Displays in one, two or three column mode depending on available space
        Touchscreen support - quickly swipe between articles on touchscreen devices
        Cut through the clutter - automatically-generated highlights prevent lower-volume feeds from getting drowned out by higher-volume ones
        Download web content - fetch full article text from the web, even if the feed only provides a summary
        Save your favorites - mark your favorite articles to keep track of them and prevent them from expiring

hits.name: Dialect
hits.description:
A translation app for GNOME.
    
      
      Features:
    
      
        Translation based on Google Translate
        Translation based on the LibreTranslate API, allowing you to use any public instance
        Translation based on Lingva Translate API
        Translation based on Bing
        Translation based on Yandex
        Translation based on DeepL
        Text to speech
        Translation history
        Automatic language detection
        Clipboard buttons

hits.name: Warble
hits.description:
Figure out the word before your guesses run out!
      
        Three difficulty levels
        Almost 5k possible answers
        Need a break? Close the game and automatically pick back up where you left off

hits.name: Amberol
hits.description:
Amberol is a music player with no delusions of grandeur. If you just
      want to play music available on your local system then Amberol is the
      music player you are looking for.
    
      Current features:
      
        adaptive UI
        UI recoloring using the album art
        drag and drop support to queue songs
        shuffle and repeat
        MPRIS integration

hits.description:
Meld is a visual diff and merge tool targeted at developers.
      Meld helps you compare files, directories, and version controlled projects.
      It provides two- and three-way comparison of both files and directories,
      and supports many version control systems including Git, Mercurial,
      Bazaar and Subversion.
    
      
      Meld helps you review code changes, understand patches, and makes enormous
      merge conflicts slightly less painful.

hits.name: Exhibit
hits.description:
Based on the F3D library, it supports many file formats, from digital content to scientific datasets including glTF, STL, STEP, PLY, OBJ, FBX, USD, Alembic and many more.
You can drag and drop 3d models into the app and export an image of the rendered model.
Change many settings like tone mapping, ambient occlusion, anti aliasing, material roughness, metallic, color and opacity to achieve the perfect render.
You can use an HDRI image or a custom color as a background.

Puedes arrastrar y soltar modelos 3D en la aplicaciÃ³n y exportar una imagen del modelo renderizado. Cambie muchos ajustes como mapeado de tonos, oclusiÃ³n ambiental, anti aliasing, rugosidad del material, metÃ¡lico, color y opacidad para conseguir el render perfecto. Puede utilizar una imagen HDRI o un color personalizado como fondo.

hits.name: Mission Center
hits.description:
Monitor your CPU, Memory, Disk, Network and GPU usage
      Features:
      
        Monitor overall or per-thread CPU usage
        See system process, thread, and handle count, uptime, clock speed (base and current), cache sizes
        Monitor RAM and Swap usage
        See a breakdown how the memory is being used by the system
        Monitor Disk utilization and transfer rates
        Monitor network utilization and transfer speeds
        See network interface information such as network card name, connection type (Wi-Fi or Ethernet),
                wireless speeds and frequency, hardware address, IP address
            
        Monitor overall GPU usage, video encoder and decoder usage, memory usage and power consumption, powered
                by the popular NVTOP project
            
        Monitor system fans
        See a breakdown of resource usage by app and process
        Supports a minified summary view for simple monitoring
        Use hardware accelerated rendering for all the graphs in an effort to reduce CPU and overall resource usage
        Uses GTK4 and Libadwaita
        Written in Rust
      
      Limitations (there is ongoing work to overcome all of these):
      
        No per-process network usage
        GPU support is experimental
        Intel GPU monitoring is only supported for Broadwell and later GPUs; and does not support VRAM, power, or temperature monitoring
        When using Linux Mint/Cinnamon, launched applications may not show up in the "Applications" section (Upstream issue: https://github.com/linuxmint/cinnamon/issues/12015)
      
      Comments, suggestions, bug reports and contributions welcome

es.description:
Monitorear el uso de su CPU, memoria, disco, red y GPU
      Funcionalidades:
      
        Monitorear el uso global o por hilo de la CPU
        Ver recuento de procesos, hilos, y controlador del sistema, tiempo activo, velocidad del reloj (base y actual), tamaÃ±os de cachÃ©
        Monitorear el uso de RAM y Swap
        Ver distribuciÃ³n de cÃ³mo la memoria estÃ¡ siendo usada por el sistema
        Monitorear el uso del disco y las tasas de transferencia
        Monitorear el uso de la red y las velocidades de transferencia
        Ver la informaciÃ³n de la interfaz de red, como el nombre de la tarjeta de red, el tipo de conexiÃ³n (Wi-Fi o Ethernet), las velocidades inalÃ¡mbricas y la frecuencia, la direcciÃ³n de hardware, la direcciÃ³n IP
        Monitorear el uso general de la GPU, el uso del codificador y decodificador de vÃ­deo, el uso de la memoria y el consumo de energÃ­a, impulsado por el popular proyecto NVTOP
        Ver distribuciÃ³n del uso de recursos por aplicaciÃ³n y proceso
        Admite una vista resumida minimizada para un monitoreo sencillo
        Usa el renderizado acelerado por hardware para todos las grÃ¡ficas en un esfuerzo por reducir el uso del CPU y de los recursos en general
        Usa GTK4 y Libadwaita
        Escrito en Rust
      
      Limitaciones (se estÃ¡ trabajando para superarlas todas):
      
        Sin uso de red por proceso
        Se admiten las GPU de manera experimental
        El monitoreo de GPU Intel solo es compatible con GPU Broadwell y posteriores; y no es compatible con monitoreo de VRAM, energÃ­a o temperatura
        Al utilizar Linux Mint/Cinnamon, es posible que las aplicaciones iniciadas no aparezcan en la secciÃ³n Â«AplicacionesÂ» (defecto originario: https://github.com/linuxmint/cinnamon/issues/12015)
      
      Comentarios, sugerencias, informes de errores y contribuciones son bienvenidos

id.description:
Pantau penggunaan CPU, Memori, Disk, Jaringan dan GPU anda
      Fitur:
      
        Pantau penggunaan CPU secara keseluruhan atau per-thread
        Lihat proses sistem, thread, dan total handle, waktu aktif, kecepatan clock (dasar dan saat ini), ukuran cache
        Pantau penggunaan RAM dan Swap
        Lihat perincian bagaimana memori digunakan oleh sistem
        Pantau penggunaan Disk dan kecepatan transfer
        Pantau penggunaan jaringan dan kecepatan transfer
        Lihat informasi antarmuka jaringan seperti nama perangkat jaringan, jenis koneksi (Wi-Fi atau Ethernet), kecepatan dan frekuensi jaringan, alamat perangkat keras, alamat IP
        Pantau penggunaan GPU secara keseluruhan, penggunaan encoder dan decoder video, penggunaan memori, dan konsumsi daya, didukung oleh proyek NVTOP yang populer
        Lihat rincian penggunaan sumber daya berdasarkan aplikasi dan proses
        Mendukung tampilan ringkasan yang diperkecil untuk pemantauan sederhana
        Menggunakan GTK4 dan Libadwaita
        Dibuat dengan Rust
      
      Keterbatasan (ada pekerjaan yang sedang berlangsung untuk mengatasi semua ini):
      
        Tidak ada penggunaan jaringan per proses
      
      Komentar, saran, laporan bug, dan kontribusi dipersilakan
id.name: Mission Center

it.description:
Monitora l'utilizzo di CPU, memoria, dischi, reti e GPU
      FunzionalitÃ :
      
        Monitora l'utilizzo della CPU, complessivo o per ciascun thread
        Mostra il conteggio dei processi di sistema, dei thread, e degli handle, il tempo di funzionamento, la frequenza di clock (di base ed attuale), le dimensioni della cache
        Monitora l'utilizzo di RAM e swap
        Visualizza come la memoria viene utilizzata dal sistema
        Monitora l'utilizzo del disco e la velocitÃ  di trasferimento
        Monitora l'utilizzo della rete e la velocitÃ  di trasferimento
        Visualizza i dettagli dell'interfaccia di rete come: nome, tipo di connessione (Wi-Fi o Ethernet), velocitÃ  e frequenza del collegamento wireless, indirizzo fisico, indirizzo IP
        Monitora l'utilizzo complessivo della GPU, l'utilizzo della codifica e decodifica video, l'uso della memoria e la potenza assorbita, grazie al popolare progetto NVTOP
        Visualizza come le risorse vengono utilizzate da applicazioni e processi
        Supporta una panoramica ridotta per un monitoraggio rapido
        Usa GTK4 e Libadwaita
        Scritto in Rust
      
      Limitazioni (stiamo lavorando per superarle):
      
        Nessun dettaglio dell'utilizzo della rete per i singoli processi
        Il supporto GPU Ã¨ sperimentale
      
      Commenti, suggerimenti, segnalazione bug e contributi vari, sono i benvenuti
it.name: Mission Center
it.summary: Controlla l'uso delle risorse del sistema

        Hold Ã¸ye med nettverksbruk og overfÃ¸ringshastigheter

nl.description:
Controleer het gebruik van je processor, geheugen, opslag, netwerk en grafische kaart
      Functies:
      
        Houd het CPU-gebruik in het algemeen of per thread in het oog
        BekÄ³k processen, threads, het aantal handles, werkingstÄ³d, (basis- en huidige) klokÂ­snelheid en cache-groottes
        Controleer gebruik van geheugen en het wisselbestand
        Bekijk een overzicht van hoe en waar geheugen gebruikt wordt door het systeem
        Controleer schijfgebruik en -overdrachtsnelheden
        Controleer netwerkgebruik en -overdrachtsnelheden
        Bekijk informatie over netwerkverbindingen waaronder de naam van de netwerkkaart, connectietype (Wi-FI of bekabelde verbinding), draadloze overdrachtsnelheden en frequentie, hardware-adressen en IP-adressen
        Controleer het algemene gebruik van je grafische kaart, video encoders en decoders, geheugen en je stroomverbruik, dankzij het populaire NVTOP-project
        Bekijk een overzicht van gebruik van bronnen per app en proces
        Ondersteunt een minimale samenvattingsweergave voor eenvoudige opvolging
        Gebruik hardwareÂ­versnelde rendering voor alle grafieken om het CPU- en algehele resourceÂ­gebruik te verminderen
        Gebruikt GTK4 en Libadwaita
        Geschreven in Rust
      
      Limitaties (we werken momenteel aan oplossingen hiervoor):
      
        Geen netwerkgebruik per proces
        GPU-ondersteuning is experimenteel
        Intel GPU-monitoring wordt alleen ondersteund voor Broadwell en latere GPU's; en ondersteunt geen VRAM-, stroom- of temperatuur-monitoring

hits.name: Tactics
hits.description:
Build your team. With Tactics, you can recreate real world lineups, plan
      for your club's next match or simply create a fantasy 11 to share with
      your friends.
    
      
      Set your formation, represent your club's colors and show the world your
      footballing genius.

hits.name: Fretboard
hits.description:
How was that chord played, again? Fretboard lets you find guitar chords
	    by typing their names or plotting them on an interactive guitar neck.
      When you have identified a chord, you can experiment with changing it,
      see more ways to play it, or bookmark it to save it for later. No matter
      if you are a beginner or an advanced guitarist, you can use Fretboard to
      practice, learn, and master your favorite songs!
	  
      
      Fretboard is proudly part of GNOME Circle, an initiative that champions the great software that is available for the GNOME platform. For more information, visit the GNOME Circle website.

hits.name: Carburetor
hits.description: Discover anonymous browsing with Carburetor on your phones and computers. Tailored for GNOME, it's your hidden superhero for online adventures, powered by TOR. Carburetor provides a local TOR proxy that hides your IP, ensuring your Internet activities remain encrypted, anonymized, and untraceable. Don't get your hands dirty with system files anymore â€“ just tap into the app, keeping your online world safe and private. Customize settings if you want, but you don't have to. Carburetor is Free Software and puts you in control. No worries, just enjoy your anonymous browsing!

hits.name: Audio Sharing
hits.description:
With Audio Sharing you can share your current computer audio playback in the form of an RTSP stream. This stream can then be played back by other devices, for example using VLC.
    
      
      By sharing the audio as a network stream, you can also use common devices that are not intended to be used as audio sinks (eg. smartphones) to receive it.
      For example, there are audio accessories that are not compatible with desktop computers (e.g. because the computer does not have a Bluetooth module installed). With the help of this app, the computer audio can be played back on a smartphone, which is then connected to the Bluetooth accessory.

en-GB.description:
With Audio Sharing you can share your current computer audio playback in the form of an RTSP stream. This stream can then be played back by other devices, for example using VLC.
      By sharing the audio as a network stream, you can also use common devices that are not intended to be used as audio sinks (e.g. smartphones) to receive it. For example, there are audio accessories that are not compatible with desktop computers (e.g. because the computer does not have a Bluetooth module installed). With the help of this app, the computer audio can be played back on a smartphone, which is then connected to the Bluetooth accessory.

Por ejemplo, hay accesorios de sonido que no son compatibles con equipos de escritorio (ej. porque el equipo no tiene un mÃ³dulo de Bluetooth instalado). Con la ayuda de esta aplicaciÃ³n el sonido del equipo se puede reproducir en un telÃ©fono mÃ³vil, cuando estÃ¡ conectado mediante Bluetooth.

id.description:
Dengan Berbagi Audio, Anda dapat berbagi pemutaran audio komputer saat ini dalam bentuk aliran RTSP. Aliran ini kemudian dapat diputar ulang oleh perangkat lain, misalnya menggunakan VLC.
      Dengan berbagi audio sebagai aliran jaringan, Anda juga dapat menggunakan perangkat umum yang tidak dimaksudkan untuk digunakan sebagai sink audio (misalnya ponsel pintar) untuk menerimanya. Misalnya, ada aksesori audio yang tidak kompatibel dengan komputer destop (mis. karena komputer tidak memasang modul Bluetooth). Dengan bantuan aplikasi ini, audio komputer dapat diputar ulang pada ponsel pintar, yang kemudian terhubung ke aksesori Bluetooth.

it.description:

      Condividendo l'audio come un flusso di rete, diventa possibile ricevere l'audio anche su dispositivi comuni che non sono pensati per essere usati come ricevitori audio (ad esempio i telefoni). Esistono degli accessori audio che non sono compatibili con i computer, per esempio perchÃ© il computer non dispone di un modulo Bluetooth installato: con l'aiuto di questa applicazione l'audio del computer puÃ² essere inoltrato al telefono, che lo riprodurrÃ  poi tramite l'accessorio Bluetooth collegato ad esso.

nl.description:
Met Audio Sharing kunt u uw huidige computeraudio delen in de vorm van een RTSP-stream. Deze stream kan dan worden afgespeeld door andere apparaten, bijvoorbeeld met VLC.
      Door de audio te delen als een netwerkstream, kunt u ook gewone apparaten gebruiken die niet bedoeld zijn om als audiosink te worden gebruikt (bijv. smartphones) om deze te ontvangen. Er zijn bijvoorbeeld audio-accessoires die niet compatibel zijn met desktopcomputers (bijv. omdat de computer geen Bluetooth-module heeft). Met behulp van deze toepassing kan de computeraudio worden afgespeeld op een smartphone, die vervolgens wordt aangesloten op het Bluetooth-accessoire.

hits.name: Pika Backup
hits.description:
Doing backups the easy way. Plugin your USB drive and let the Pika do the rest for you.
    
      
        Create backups locally and remotely
        Set a schedule for regular backups
        Save time and disk space because Pika Backup does not need to copy known data again
        Encrypt your backups
        List created archives and browse through their contents
        Recover files or folders via your file browser
      
      
      Pika Backup is designed to save your personal data and does not support complete system recovery. Pika Backup is powered by the well-tested BorgBackup software.

hits.name: Denaro
hits.description: â€” Manage multiple accounts at a time, with a familiar tab interfaceâ€” Easily filter transactions by type, group, or dateâ€” Easily repeat transactions, such as bills that occur every monthâ€” Transfer money from one account to anotherâ€” Export an account as a CSV file and import a CSV, OFX or QIF file to bulk add transactions to an account

hits.name: XnConvert
hits.description:
XnConvert is multi-platform, it is available for Windows, Mac, and Linux for both 32-bit and 64-bit editions.
      XnConvert is Multilingual, it includes more than 20 different translations.
      It offers powerful features in an easy to use interface providing convenient drag & drop functionality.
      XnConvert is compatible with more than 500 formats and Export to about 70 different file formats.
      Combine and choose between more than 80 different operations including:
      
        Metadata Editing
        Transforms: Rotate, Crop, Resize, ...
        Adjustments: Brightness, Contrast, Saturation, ...
        Filters: Blur, Emboss, Sharpen, ...
        Effects: Masking, Watermark, Vignetting, ...
      
      and seamlessly export to NConvert for a command line usage.
      XnConvert is provided as freeware.
      You are granted the right to use and to make an unlimited number of copies of this software.
      Copyright (C) 1997-2019 Pierre-e Gougelet. All rights reserved.

hits.name: Multiplication Puzzle
hits.description:
Multiplication Puzzle is a simple game inspired by the multiplication game inside the popular editor emacs.
      You are presented with a long multiplication problem where a 3-digit number is multiplied by a 2-digit number, yielding two intermediate 4-digit numbers and a final 5-digit answer. However, all the digits are replaced by letters.
      Your job is to discover which letters are which digits.

hits.name: Katharsis
hits.description:
Katharsis is a simple GUI for the Kathara computer network emulation framework.
      It allows you to start and stop labs and connect to the containers in a convenient way.
      It allows you to conveniently open multiple container terminals next to each other.
      Katharsis requires Docker to be installed in rootful mode, and you have to be in the docker group.

hits.name: Whaler
hits.description: Whaler provides basic functionality for managing Docker containers. The app can start and stop both standalone containers and docker-compose applications. Also, it supports viewing container logs.The solution is perfect for those who are looking for a simple tool to perform some basic actions. For the app to run correctly, make sure that Docker is installed on your system.

hits.name: Varia
hits.description:
Varia is a download manager for all your download needs. It can download regular files and torrents, and do it very quickly.

      
Using Varia is very easy and straightforward, and with its aria2 backend it can potentially increase the speed of your downloads. It can integrate with Firefox or Chrome/ium through a browser extension, configured to your liking, and even support a remote aria2 instance on another computer.

hits.name: Pithos
hits.description:
An easy to use native Pandora Radio client that is more lightweight than the pandora.com web client and integrates with the desktop.
      It supports most functionality of pandora.com such as rating songs, creating/managing stations, quickmix, etc. On top of that it has many features such as last.fm scrobbling

hits.name: GNOME Chess
hits.summary: Play the classic two-player board game of chess
hits.description:
GNOME Chess is a simple chess game. You can play against your computer at
      three different difficulty levels, or against a friend at your computer.
    
      
      Computer chess enthusiasts will appreciate GNOME Chessâ€™s compatibility with
      nearly all modern computer chess engines, and its ability to detect several
      popular engines automatically if installed.

hits.name: Panel Cleaner
hits.summary: Let AI clean manga panels for you
hits.description:
This tool uses machine learning to find text and then generates masks to cover it up with the 
    highest accuracy possible.
      It is designed to clean easy bubbles, no in-painting or out-of-bubble text removal is (currently) done.
      This is intended to save a lot of monotonous work for people who have to clean a lot of panels, 
    while making sure it doesn't paint over anything that it wasn't supposed to.

de.description:

hits.name: Photometry
hits.description:
Photometry shows light distribution curves and metadata of IESNA and EULUMDAT photometric
            files which describe the light distribution of light sources like lamps and luminaires and
            are used mostly for data transfer in the lighting industry and in 3D graphics.
        
      
            Photometry allows editing the source content of the opened photometric file and shows the following
            information contained in the opened files:
        
      
        Light distribution curves
        General information (Catalog Number, Manufacturer, Description, etc.)
        Photometric properties (Light Output Ratio and Downward Flux Fraction)
        Lamps and ballast information
        Luminaire and luminous opening geometry information
        Additional properties (Test number, issue date, test laboratory, etc.)
        Intensity Values for selected C planes and gamma angles

            Photometriedateien beschreiben die Lichtverteilung von Lampen und Leuchten und werden vor allem
            fÃ¼r Datentransfer in der Leuchtenindustrire und 3D-Grafik eingesetzt.
        
      
            Photometrie erlaubt den Inhalt der Photometriedateien zu bearbeiten und zeigt folgende Informationen an:
        
      
        Lichtverteilungskurve
        Allgemeine Informationen (Katalognummer, Hersteller, Beschreibung, usw.)
        Photometishce Eigenschaften

hits.name: Junction
hits.description:
Junction pops up automatically when you open a file or link in another app.
      Use the mouse or keyboard navigation to choose which app you want to open it with.
    
      Features:
      
        Choose the app to open with
        Show the location before opening
        Edit the URL before opening
        Show a hint for insecure links
        Keyboard navigation
        Supports desktop actions on right click
        Middle Click or Ctrl + Click to open in multiple applications
        Linux Mobile support
